attributes.action: demand that the new London 2012 Brand is scrapped.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The newly announced brand for the 2012 Olympics is, quite simply, shocking.

The design is extremely 1980s and poorly executed. This new brand, on an international level, is nothing short of awful and reflects badly on us as a nation.

Is this the best that the UK's finest designers, renowned as the best in the world, can muster?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
